firearm.name: Hunter Firearm
firearm.about: Firearm is a perfect choice if you’re new to LADS' combat. Easy combos make it good for boss stages. Charged attack deal multitarget DMG making it good for  mob stages but it takes more time to perform.

basic_attack.name: Precise Firing
basic_attack.description: Wield dual guns for a combo up to 5 hits. Charged Attack will knock back nearby enemies. Both scale with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Weakpoint
passive_skill.description: 20% chance of dealing additional DMG on hit. When using [Active Skill], this increases to 80%, and additionally increases ATK Speed by 16%.

active_skill.name: In Hot Pursuit
active_skill.description: You perform one big DMG shot from your guns.

sword.name: Hunter Sword
sword.about: Feels good to play on boss stages.

basic_attack.name: Pierce
basic_attack.description: Perform a combo up to 4 hits. Charged Attack creates a single slash.  Both scale with ATK. When [Hunter's Intention] is at 10 stacks, Charged Attack will be empowered.

passive_skill.name: Hunter's Intention
passive_skill.description: Gain a stack of [Hunter's Intention] for every instance of DMG dealt, up to 10 stacks. 1 stack increases ATK by 1.4%. Removed when being hit.

active_skill.name: Blade's Shadow
active_skill.description: Unleash a slashing attack dealing [AoE] DMG.

wand.name: Hunter Wand
wand.about: A perfect choice when you need a bit of healing for particular stages.

basic_attack.name: Magnetic Pulse
basic_attack.description: Wield a wand for a combo up to 4 hits. Charged Attack launches enemies. Both scale with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Magnetic Resonance
passive_skill.description: Charged attack range's increased every 15s and deals massive ATK DMG.

active_skill.name: Magnetic Nexus
active_skill.description: Creates a field that inflicts 6 instances of ATK DMG. While active, restores HP to  you and your companion.

claymore.name: Hunter Claymore
claymore.about: Hunter Claymore is the most prominent standard weapon in the community due to its passive. Mastering [Gathering Stacks] is hard but really rewarding. To learn how to use them go to Training Room → Freestyle → Sustained Battle and practice Dodge + 1 Basic Attack. When triggered correctly, you will gain one stack. Remember to collect all three before using [Active Skill] otherwise you will perform a much weaker hit. It can be used with any companion, like other standard weapons but remember it scales with ATK so it is better not to use it with companions that use HP or DEF as their main stat.

basic_attack.name: Indomitable Edge
basic_attack.description: Wield a claymore for a combo up to 4 hits. Charged Attack makes you smash the ground dealing [AoE] DMG. Both scale with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Persistence
passive_skill.description: Allows you to empower your [Active Skill] by 50% using [Gathering Stacks] and skip the charging time. You need to collect all three stacks to utilize this. One stack increases your [Basic Attack] by 12.9%.

active_skill.name: Frangere Slash
active_skill.description: Hold the button to charge your attack to deal big DMG, you can also press it to release an incomplete charge with smaller DMG.

skill_basic_info.resonance_skill: Only that skill helps you to destroy enemy’s shields. On full Stellactrum match destroys 2 layers of the shield.
skill_basic_info.ardent_oath: Usually you can use it once during a battle, use [Oath Recovery Boost] protocore to utilize it twice.
